https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/whP9L70ILJMOrlUOq7uMLW1hJF0.jpg When single photographer Kenna finally gets her own exhibition, she turns her attention to her love life. Yet two different men, sensitive Jeff and strong-willed Martin, are determined to win her heart, pulling her free spirit in opposite directions. Bending All the Rules
